name: PORTICO - Better Online Shopping
description: Browse multiple stores with just a click. Easily find the listing with the lowest price.

background.content_security_policy: worker-src blob: 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' 'inline-speculation-rules' http://localhost:* http://127.0.0.1:* https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; object-src 'self'
